BatchCreateRoom.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lcic.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateRoom
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SdkAppId": 1,
    "RoomInfos": [
        {
            "AutoMic": 1,
            "Name": "xx",
            "AudioQuality": 1,
            "TurnOffMic": 1,
            "MaxMicNumber": 1,
            "SubType": "xx",
            "StartTime": 1,
            "TeacherId": "xx",
            "EndTime": 1,
            "Resolution": 1,
            "DisableRecord": 1,
            "Assistants": []
        }
    ]
}
BatchCreateRoom.title: 批量创建课堂

SetAppCustomContent.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lcic.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SetAppCustomContent
<公共请求参数>

{
    "SdkAppId": 123,
    "CustomContent": [
        {
            "Scene": "default",
            "LogoUrl": "https://yourdomain.com/logo.png",
            "HomeUrl": "https://yourdomain.com/login",
            "JsUrl": "https://yourdomain.com/default.js",
            "CssUrl": "https://yourdomain.com/default.css"
        }
    ]
}
SetAppCustomContent.title: 设置应用自定义内容
